title: Anker’s new Nano II 100W GaN charger is 30% smaller than Apple’s 96W adapter, now available
content:
After being first revealed back at CES, Anker’s latest addition to its stable of chargers is finally available. Enter the new Nano II 100W, a USB-C power adapter centered around the brand’s GaN II charging technology. Sporting a three-port design with an ultra-compact build, it’s 30% smaller than Apple’s comparative wall adapter and is .

more…

The post Anker’s new Nano II 100W GaN charger is 30% smaller than Apple’s 96W adapter, now available appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Anker Nano II 100W arrives as the brand's latest USB-C GaN Charger with a three-port design that's 30% smaller than Apple's 96W wall adapter.
